directions: Mix lemons wedges, 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons water, lemon juice, and salt together in a microwave-safe container.
Cook in the microwave for 10 minutes, stirring at 2-minute intervals to prevent spills.
Pour the mixture into a sterilized, airtight jar. Let stand for 24 hours before using.
title: Citrons Confits Express (Quick Preserved Lemons)
